text: The daughter of pop legend Michael Jackson has emerged as the favourite to play Madonna is a movie about her life. Producers reportedly want 19 - year - old Paris Jackson to take the lead in the Vogue singer's biopic Blonde Ambition. The film will explore the iconic singer's life and doppelganger Paris is seen as the perfect person to bring the role to life.
